com.teamten.render

Class Triangle

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.teamten.render.Triangle

  • public class Triangle
extends Object
    Represents an immutable triangle in 3D.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int NUM_VERTICES 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Triangle(Vertex... vertices) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Vertex get(int index)
      Return vertex at index (0, 1, or 2), with no bounds checking.
      Vector getCentroid()
      Return the centroid of the triangle, which is just the average of the three vertices.
      Vector getEdge(int index)
      Return the vector from vertex index to index + 1.
      Vector getEdgeNormal(int index)
      Return a normal to edge from vertex index to index + 1.
      Vector getNormal()
      Return the geometric normal of the triangle.
      List<Triangle> tesselate()
      Return a list of four triangles that make this triangle.
      String toString()

    • Field Detail

      • NUM_VERTICES

        public static final int NUM_VERTICES
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • Triangle

        public Triangle(Vertex... vertices)
         throws DegenerateTriangleException
        Throws:
        DegenerateTriangleException

    • Method Detail

      • get

        public Vertex get(int index)
        Return vertex at index (0, 1, or 2), with no bounds checking.

      • getNormal

        public Vector getNormal()
        Return the geometric normal of the triangle. The normal will point toward you if the vertices are in clockwise order.

      • getCentroid

        public Vector getCentroid()
        Return the centroid of the triangle, which is just the average of the three vertices.

      • getEdge

        public Vector getEdge(int index)
        Return the vector from vertex index to index + 1. This is not normalized.

      • getEdgeNormal

        public Vector getEdgeNormal(int index)
        Return a normal to edge from vertex index to index + 1. This is not normalized.

      • tesselate

        public List<Triangle> tesselate()
        Return a list of four triangles that make this triangle. Splits each of the three edges, connects the three split points to make the center triangle, and also returns the our three triangles. Each returned triangle is guaranteed to be smaller in all dimensions than the original.

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
